greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Coefficients in expansion of Delta'(q).
comment: First derivative of cusp form Delta (see A000594).
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000

M. Kaneko and D. Zagier, Supersingular j-invariants, hypergeometric series and Atkin's orthogonal polynomials, pp. 97-126 of D. A. Buell and J. T. Teitelbaum, eds., Computational Perspectives on Number Theory, Amer. Math. Soc., 1998
maple: with(numtheory); E:=proc(k) series(1-(2*k/bernoulli(k))*add( sigma[k-1](n)*q^n, n=1..60),q,61); end; Delta:=series((E(4)^3-E(6)^2)/1728,q,60); diff(%,q);
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Feb 28 2009
